[`PropertyOption`](PropertyOption)

## PropertyOption interface

A dropdown menu allowing selection of a property.

 1.10.0

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PropertyOption extends BaseOption 
```
**Extends:** [`BaseOption`](BaseOption)
